data.eml:eml: The oribatid mite genus Topalia in Australia (Oribatida: Nosybeidae) and the taxonomic status of related families and genera

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colloff, Matthew J. (2019): The oribatid mite genus Topalia in Australia (Oribatida: Nosybeidae) and the taxonomic status of related families and genera. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 290-321, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.18
